attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On March 18th 2003, Tony Blair made the speech that launched the Iraq War; against the will and instincts of the British people and in contravention of international law.  It is the most outrageous speech ever made in the House of Commons.  This petition is for a day of national repentence to be launched annually in memory of it, and for those behind the conspiracy to be brought to justice.  Most of all, let's learn the lessons from 500,000 deaths!
